## Selected talks

```{r echo = FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
talk_table = yaml::read_yaml("tables/talks.yaml") %>%
  do.call(rbind, .) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(title = ifelse(
    url == "NA",
    title,
    paste0("<a href='",
           url,
           "'>",
           title,
           "</a>"))) %>%
  dplyr::select(-url)
DT::datatable(talk_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 'ftip'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```
